languages.text: "Я запрещаю тебе передвигаться по кораблю без надзора, а на время варп-перелета будешь сидеть взаперти. Выбирай — или так, или смерть".

traits.locale_text: "Я запрещаю тебе передвигаться по кораблю без надзора, а на время варп-перелета будешь сидеть взаперти. Выбирай — так, или смерть".

languages.text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."
languages.original_text: "Я запрещаю тебе передвигаться по кораблю без надзора, а на время варп-перелета будешь сидеть взаперти. Выбирай — или так, или смерть".

traits.locale_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."
"I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."
"I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."
"I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."
"I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

languages.text: « Vous avez interdiction de circuler dans le vaisseau sans surveillance, et à compter de maintenant, vous serez placé à l'isolement strict lors des sauts Warp. Si vous refusez, c'est la mort qui vous attend. À vous de voir. »
languages.original_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez interdiction de circuler dans le vaisseau sans surveillance, et à compter de maintenant, vous serez placé à l'isolement strict lors des sauts Warp. Si vous refusez, c'est la mort qui vous attend. À vous de voir. »

languages.text: 「監視なしに船内を動き回ることを禁ずる。ワープジャンプの間は、現住に収監される。動き回れば死が待っている。選択はお前次第だ」
languages.original_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: 「監視なしに船内を動き回ることを禁ずる。ワープジャンプの間は、現住に収監される。動き回れば死が待っている。選択はお前次第だ」

languages.text: “我禁止你在无人监督的情况下在船上走动。从现在开始，亚空间跳跃期间，我会派人把你锁起来。如果你不打算听话，我现在就杀了你。选择权在你手里。”
languages.original_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: “我禁止你在无人监督的情况下在船上走动。从现在开始，亚空间跳跃期间，我会派人把你锁起来。如果你不打算听话，我现在就杀了你。选择权在你手里。”

languages.text: "Ich verbiete Euch, Euch unbeaufsichtigt auf dem Schiff zu bewegen. Und von nun an werdet Ihr während Warpsprüngen eingesperrt. Die Alternative ist der Tod. Ihr entscheidet."
languages.original_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verbiete Euch, Euch unbeaufsichtigt auf dem Schiff zu bewegen. Und von nun an werdet Ihr während Warpsprüngen eingesperrt. Die Alternative ist der Tod. Ihr entscheidet."

languages.text: «Te prohíbo que deambules por la nave sin supervisión, y a partir de este momento permanecerás bajo llave durante los saltos de disformidad. La alternativa es la muerte. Dejo la elección en tus manos».
languages.original_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: «Te prohíbo que deambules por la nave sin supervisión, y a partir de este momento permanecerás bajo llave durante los saltos a la disformidad. La alternativa es la muerte. Dejo la elección en tus manos».

languages.text: "Gemide gözetimsiz şekilde dolaşmanı yasaklıyorum. Ayrıca şu andan itibaren öte sıçramalar sırasında kilit altında tutulacaksın. Alternatifi ise ölüm. Seçim senin."
languages.original_text: "I forbid you from moving about the ship unsupervised, and from here on out, you will be kept under lock and key during warp jumps. The alternative is death. The choice is yours."

traits.locale_text: "Gemide gözetimsiz şekilde dolaşmanı yasaklıyorum ve bu andan itibaren öte sıçramalar sırasında kilit altında tutulacaksın. Alternatifin ise ölüm. Seçim senin."
